entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Tillsonburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:41 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Delhi 5:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.3°C
Wind: E 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of rain or freezing rain this evening and ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing late this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southeast 20 this evening then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:18 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early in the morning with risk of freezing rain. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:18 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:18 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
